column2: integrity and caring site manager: login home obituaries about us our facilities services merchandise planning a funeral pre-planning immediate arrangements grief support expressions of sympathy links obituaries jimmy l. davis (april 24
column4: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card jimmy l. davis was born on april 24
column5: 1949. he went to be with the lord
column7: 2015. jimmy was the fifth child born to vivian and john davis. he accepted christ at an early age. jimmy attended sojourner truth elementary school
column8: phillis wheatley high school and st. philips college in san antonio
column9: texas. jimmy was drafted into the united states army. he served his country proudly
column10: attaining the rank of sergeant. during his tour of duty
column11: he fought in vietnam for over 18 months as a combat infantryman. his term of service ended with a medical discharge. jimmy went on to work for turbine support for 15 years of dedicated service. jimmy married patricia jenkins. to this union
column13: joseph jerome davis j. j.. they were happily married for 41 years. jimmy leaves to mourn his passing
column21: charles davis and glen davis; aunt
